test.name: TEST-DEF-80380
test.description: Create a unit test for the pmk_sparc_enable_FP system call. Run the same code in a second non-authorized partition and check that a Health Monitor event is generated.

teststep.description: Call pmk_sparc_enable_FP and check that no Health Monitor event was generated.
Perform a Floating Point operation and check that no Health Monitor event was generated.
Call pmk_sparc_enable_FP and check that a PMK_VIOL_ERR is captured by the health monitoring.
Perform a Floating Point operation and check that a PMK_FLOAT_ERR is captured by the health monitoring.
Perform a cumulative Floating Point operation and check that no Health Monitor event was generated.
Perform a Floating Point operation and check that no Health Monitor event was generated.
